name: Pump & Jump!
description:
Pump & Jump! is a turn-based platformer where you move and jump by using the recoil of your shotgun!

Controls
  • 4 arrow keys
Features
  • Randomly-generated and destructible terrain!
  • Powerups!
  • Enemies!
  • Real-time combo system!
Credits
  • Music by UltraCat.
